lines.text: When it was standing, it was probably pretty big. The <c=#FF0000>Go Wizard</c> would have to walk around it.
To get from the hay bales to where he ended up. It's not a straight line, where he could've stumbled back.
He started the fire, but got shot by Slick in the middle of casting, and... went over to the trash nook to stop drop and roll?
You think he'd try to put himself out while right next to the fire? He'd- he'd want to move!
I'm not sure he'd have time to move that far- that chest wound's kinda... big. And fatal-looking. And he was old.
Wh-why are we talking about the logistics of- of walking around a table?!
Does it matter? It doesn't! That's- that's not a contradiction!
...Yeah, it wouldn't stand up in court, really.
